params._executor: The address of the executor for the composed message.
params._extraData: Additional arbitrary data in bytes passed by the entity who executes the lzCompose.
params._from: The address initiating the composition, typically the OApp where the lzReceive was called.
params._guid: The unique identifier for the corresponding LayerZero src/dst tx.
params._message: The composed message payload in bytes. NOT necessarily the same payload passed via lzReceive.

lzCompose(address,bytes32,bytes,address,.notice: Composes a LayerZero message from an OApp.
